meta.title: About Barringtons - Family Funeral Directors Since 1902 - Liverpool
meta.description: Four generations of caring funeral service in Liverpool. Led by David Barrington (NAFD President 2019-2021). Over 3000 memorial trees planted. Trusted, independent & compassionate.

intro.title: About Barrington
intro.subtitle: A family caring for families
intro.description1: As an independent, family-owned funeral business, we've been caring for Liverpool families through these times with warmth, understanding, and genuine compassion.
intro.description2: Founded by Bill Barrington, our funeral service has been an integral part of Liverpool's community for generations. Now run by David and Claire Barrington, we understand that every family has a story, and every goodbye deserves to be as unique and special as the life it honors.

director.name: David Barrington - Director
director.title: NAFD President 2019-2021 | NAFD Approved Tutor
director.description: With over 30 years in funeral care, David and Claire Barrington continue a legacy of compassion and understanding, helping families through their most difficult times with patience and respect. David's distinguished service as NAFD President and his role as an approved tutor demonstrates our commitment to the highest standards in funeral care.

promise.title: Our Promise to You
promise.description: When you choose Barringtons, you're not just another number. You're entrusting us with the privilege of celebrating your loved one's life. We promise to guide you with patience and care, always respecting your wishes, no matter how unique or traditional they may be.
promise.trusted_description: We're proud members of the National Association of Funeral Directors (NAFD), Society of Allied and Independent Funeral Directors (SAIF), Association of Green Funeral Directors, and recommended by the Good Funeral Guide for our high standards of care.
promise.growing_description: For every funeral we arrange, we plant a memorial tree - over 3,000 planted so far. It's our way of creating something lasting and positive from moments of loss, providing families with a living tribute to their loved one.

locations.title: Our Three Offices - Always Close By
locations.subtitle: With three conveniently located offices across Liverpool, we're always nearby when you need us.
